comments.content:
Hrant,   
   
You should be comforted by the following: I can identify   
an odd font now and then, but I cannot...   
   
...design a non-latin typeface   
...speak Armenian   
...post to eighteen discussion groups simutaneously   
...spell   
   
You win on these counts and more.   
   
Stephen

But none of those 4 things are money-makers, whereas I think you should start up fontidsrus.com as soon as possible! :-)   
   
hhp

This is so much like Ole's Unicratica   
(critique: sans serif: unicratica) I wish I   
could just use that...

possibly something from Identikal via T26.   
   
bj
